content: chestnut placemats & coasters www circuloyarns com * to * until eor end with 5 double_crochet chestnut placemats row 2 chain 3 3 double_crochet * chain 2 skip 2 base sts 3 double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 base sts 7 double_crochet* repeat from * to * until the eor & coasters end with 4 double_crochet created by anita eskelen continue following chart 2 work back & forth size do not cut yarn placemats 18 25 x 13 75 crochet edge around placemats - chart 3 coasters 5 5 x 5 5 level intermediate mk crochet edges material nd 1 chain 3 1 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet forming corner * work 3 balls of apolo eco 4/4 color 7466 around placemat 1 double_crochet for every base sts into crochet hook d-3 disclaimer corners mk 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet * repeat from * to *3x more close with 1 slip_stitch continue following chart 3 crochet in the round close rnds with 1 slip_stitch stitch glossary and abbreviations stitch st make mk skip skip chain chain slip st slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet eor end of row coasters follow chart placemats follow chart crochet edge follow chart coasters mk 2 follow chart 1 mk a magic_ring round 1 chain 3 2 double_crochet *chain 2 space 3 double_crochet* repeat from * to * 2x more close with 1 slip_stitch round 2 chain 3 4 double_crochet * chain 2 space 7 double_crochet* repeat from * to * 2x chain 2 2 double_crochet close with 1 slip_stitch continue following chart 1 crochet in the round placemat mk 2 follow chart 2 chain 85 + 3 to turn row 1 insert hook into 5th chain 4 double_crochet *chain 2 skip 2 base sts 1 double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 base sts 9 double_crochet repeat from www circuloyarns com 2 chart 1 coasters mk 2 chart 3 crochet edge around placemats chart 2 placemat mk 2 www circuloyarns com 3
